text: Tab Hunter (born Arthur Andrew Kelm; July 11, 1931 - July 8, 2018) was an American actor, pop singer, movie producer, and author. He starred in more than 40 movies. He was born in New York City. Hunter was known for her roles in Damn Yankees, Sweet Kill, and Grease 2. His famous song was "Young Love". Hunter was gay. From 1983 to 2018, Hunter was in a partnership with Allan Glaser. Hunter died on July 8, 2018 from cardiac arrest complicated by thrombosis in Santa Barbara, California, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Tab Hunter official website * * Tab Hunter fansite Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American pop singers Category:American musical theatre actors Category:American autobiographers Category:American LGBT writers Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT actors Category:Gay men Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Singers from New York City Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City
title: Tab Hunter
